name: Galaxy Bricks
description:
Galaxy Bricks is a mashup of two very well known games Galaga and Arkanoid. A Arcade Fixed shooter type game. The gameplay mechanics and rules are simple. Destroy the bricks on each level to progress to the next one. However enemies might spawn from these bricks, and attack you!

The player will have powerups to help them deal with every obstacle of each level as they progress through campaign and endless mode respectively.
Unlock different themes to change the art style of the game as you complete the campaigns to use in endless.
